column1:
How can the Form on my group be used? How can it be useful for my group?|

You can create a custom Form on your group and receive user responses for it. The form on your group is highly customizable
column2: and you can create any fields of your choice in it. You can also add your own title and description for the Form on your group. With this Form on your group
column3: you can also receive contact information from users like their name
column5: etc. This form can be used for various purposes. For example
column6: if you are a hotel owner
column8: then you could use this form to receive bookings from users. This form can also be used to receive user feedbacks
column11:
etc. Responses of visitors for the form will be emailed to all group Admins.

|Group Solutions|Form

column1:
How can I manage the Form on my group?|

You can manage the Form on your group from the “Apps” section of your group Dashboard
column2: by clicking on the “Manage Form” button. From there
column3: you can configure the questions and properties of your form. To add a new question to the Form
column4:
click on the “Add a Question” link in the bottom portion of the “Manage Form” group.

|Group Solutions|Form

column1:
Can I make certain form fields as required?|

Yes
column2: you can make certain fields in the Form on your group as required / not required by selecting appropriate option for the “Required” field while adding a new question to Form. At any time
column3:
you can also change the “Required” property for a field by editing that field.

|Group Solutions|Form

column1:
How will I receive the responses when the Form on my group is filled by visitors?|

You
column2:
and the other Admins of your group (if any) will receive responses for the form filled on your group via email.

|Group Solutions|Form

column1: I have a group on this site. However
column2:
the Form feature is not available for my group. What can be the reason?|

There could be multiple reasons for this:
1) You might have chosen a Package for your group for which the Form App is not available. In this case
column3: you can see if choosing a different Package with the Form App suits you. You can change the Package for your group from the “Packages” section of your group Dashboard. Availability of Packages for groups
column4:
and their features are conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.
2) It is possible that you might not have configured the Form for your group. You can configure the Form for your group by clicking on the “Manage Form” button in the “Apps” section of your group Dashboard.
3) You might not have activated the Form for your group. From the “Manage Form” section mentioned in point 2 above
column5:
you can activate the Form for your group by using the “Activate Form” field.

|Group Solutions|Form
